showScoreExcerpt:
"A mixed bag...Metcalf's scenes with Houdyshell crackle with wit and an undercurrent of tension and loss...Condola Rashad as Emmy offers a winning presence, but she cannot resolve the contradictions written into her role...Cooper seemed completely at sea...The fault though lies with the script. Metcalf and Houdyshell simply steamrolled over the playâ€™s weaknesses, while Cooper could not resolve them with his process...The play simply did not know what it wanted to be."
